column4: BRIEF-Deluxe Corp. Acquires Logomix, A Provider Of Custom Marketing Products For Small Businesses
column6: * DELUXE CORP. ACQUIRES LOGOMIX, A PROVIDER OF CUSTOM MARKETING PRODUCTS FOR SMALL BUSINESSES
column7: * DELUXE CORP - ACQUIRED LOGOMIX FOR $43 MILLION IN AN ALL CASH TRANSACTION.
column8: * DELUXE CORP - LOGOMIX FOUNDER CRAIG BLOEM WILL TAKE A POSITION AS VICE PRESIDENT IN SMALL BUSINESS SERVICES UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
